content: हर्षः [हृष्-घञ्] {@--1@} Joy, delight, pleasure, satisfaction, gladness, rapture, glee, exultation; हर्षो हर्षो हृदयवसतिः पंचबाणस्तु बाणः <ls>P. R. 1. 22</ls>; सहोत्थितः सैनिकहर्षनिःस्वनैः <ls>R. 3. 61.</ls> {@--2@} Thrilling, bristling, erection (of the hair of the body); as in रोमहर्ष <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--3@} Joy, considered as one of the 33 or 34 subordinate feelings; हर्षस्त्विष्टावाप्तेर्मनःप्रसादोऽश्रुगद्गदादिकरः <ls>S. D. 195</ls>; or इष्टप्राप्त्यादिजन्मा सुखविशेषो हर्षः <ls>R. G.</ls>
हर्ष The patron of Bāṇa, see बाण. The Ratnāvalī is supposed to have been written by Bāṇa and published under his patron's name.
